articles.description: The 21-year-old has revealed his same-sex relationship during Pride Month, taking to his Instagram Story on Saturday to make the announcement.
articles.content:
Peter Sawkins has revealed his same-sex relationship during Pride Month, taking to his Instagram Story on Saturday to make the announcement.
The Great British Bake Off winner, 21, was inundated with… [+4029 chars]
